name: Newest Art Game *Hot*Girls*Only
description:
When an unnamed Rhizome editor made a Facebook post about how artists barely know how to make a game and yet parade around the art world like they've just invented the medium - Newest Art Game *Hot*Girls*Only, was born. 

The white cube deserves this digital, 2020 looking, treatment of games as a self-aware, self-critical platform for artists.

The first of the sub-alt game genre.

A collab between Hannah Epstein and Kevin Brophy.
